title: shinfly Chair Leg Floor Protectors, Non Slip Felt Pads for Furniture Feet, Nail in Chair Leg Floor Protectors with 4mm Thick, Diameter 22mm
features: Premium Quality: Our chair leg floor protectors are crafted from high-quality felt, ensuring durability and longevity. The 4 mm thick felt feet provide exceptional protection for your floors, allowing your furniture to glide silently without leaving any scratches.

Floor Protection: These felt pads for furniture feet are designed to protect sensitive flooring such as parquet, laminate, cork, tiles, and stone floors from potential damage due to furniture movement. They offer a reliable and long-lasting solution for floor protection.

Noise Reduction: With their thick felt material and strong bearing capacity, our furniture felt pads significantly reduce friction, vibration, and noise when moving furniture. This feature creates a quieter and more peaceful environment for your home.
Easy Installation: Our furniture pads floor protectors can be effortlessly installed. They can withstand heavy loads without any hassle, making installation a breeze.

Versatile and Abundant: Our pads for chair legs includes 24 chair feet protectors nail, each with a 24 mm diameter and 4 mm thickness. They are suitable for use on chair or table legs, preventing scratches, slipping, and noise on various floor surfaces. The package offers a practical and environmentally friendly solution with abundant felt pads for all your needs.

specifications_table.Surface recommendation: ‎Parquet, laminate, cork floor, tiles, stone floor
